name: YNG Media
overview:
YNG Media is a boutique digital marketing agency that strives to create innovation, engagement and relevance for its client partners through emerging digital platforms - social, mobile and ecommerce.

Offering services in the areas of strategy, design, marketing and development; YNG continues to work with brands that want solutions born from collaboration, research and creativity. With offices in Delhi and NCR, YNG Media finds itself working with brands and companies all over India.   

We are a collective of passionate entrepreneurs that believe marketing and technology co-exist only to provide a balanced solution for the challenge at hand.   

Our core services include the following:  > Digital strategy that is cross platform (search + web + mobile + social)   > Design (ux, ui, websites, web apps, software, social media)   > Digital marketing (seo, ppc, social media, email marketing, guerilla marketing, video, analytics, consulting)   > Development (websites, applications, PHP, Magento, ecommerce, HTML5, motion graphics, mobile, iPhone, Android, iPad, Wordpress)

Specialties Web Design & Branding, Web Development, Search Engine Optimization, Search Engine Marketing, Project Management, Web Analytics, Social media management, Online Branding, Google Adwords, Digital Marketing, Online Marketing, Mobile Marketing, Digital Branding
